name: SpaceJobRP
description:
(I dont recommend you to print the cards)
Simple cards RolePlay game for playing with friends, for now its just a concept, the cards design are really generic and big, but i intend to polish the game in the near future.
Because english is not my main language, I just google translated all the cards, and probably there are some miss translations in some cards, but how this isnt the final version i ask for some patience. The rules are really unpolished but i guess its understandable  and as I said they will be improved too in the future.
The main goal of the game is to have fun, if you dont like some rule just change it, the important part is to laugh, a lot!
